name: Lenard trips, gets dizzy
description:
Lenard a goofy dude is on an adventure collecting hotdogs. He might have an accident on his way so it's your job to keep him safe!

Controls: Use mouse to drag and drop objects infront of Lenard to make sure he reaches the exit.

Press "S" to make Lenard start walking and "R" to reset.

Collect all the hotdogs on your adventure for a suprise at the end!
